article:
Dear Peter,
Thanks for your letter and your photos. My name is Kipanik. The  _  is from Inuktitut. I live in Iqaluit. It's a  _  town of about 200 people in Canada. It's winter now and it is -20 C these  _ . There is snow on the ground and some  _  on the river. My friends and I often play  _  on the ice. You know, ice hockey is my favourite sport.
My favourite animals are white mice. I have three white mice at home. And I have a white one  _  black ears, too. I like playing computer games and I like  _  my father's snowmobile  .My  favourite  _  is fish and chips.
There are five people in my family. We can all  _  English, but we speak Inuktitut at home. My English teacher  _  me with this letter.
Please write to me about you and your home.
Yours,
Kipanik
